title: Trusting God with Your Adult Child, Part 1
itunes:author: Guest: Jodie Berndt
itunes:summary: Parents often play whack-a-mole. They help their teens or adult children through one problem and another pops up. John and Danny provide hope and encouragement for the whack-a-mole parent. Receive the book Praying the Scriptures for Your Adult Children with your gift of any amount!
description: Parents often play whack-a-mole. They help their teens or adult children through one problem and another pops up. John and Danny provide hope and encouragement for the whack-a-mole parent. Receive the book Praying the Scriptures for Your Adult Children with your gift of any amount!

John and Danny provide hope and encouragement for the whack-a-mole parent. Receive the book Praying the Scriptures for Your Adult Children with your gift of any amount!
